## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. 

```{r chunk 1, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)
data("penguins")
penguins <- penguins 
str(penguins)

table(penguins$sex, penguins$species, useNA = "always")
# look at include echo or results or warning to find out more functions # 
```

```{r penguin plot, echo=FALSE, warning = FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.cap= "Hello I am a figure caption"}


ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, group = species, 
                            colour = species)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  theme_bw()

```

```{r penguin model, echo=FALSE, warning = FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.cap= "Hello I am a figure caption"}
hist(penguins$body_mass_g)
model1 <- lm(body_mass_g ~ flipper_length_mm * species, data = penguins)

summary(model1)
```
